title: Holiday WeWow Day 5: Sweating over Sweaters
description:
It's the last day of Holiday WeWow, and we're designing holiday sweaters! Join Mindy and Guy in celebrating a special secret someone by creating your own holiday sweater! Head to tinkercast.com for more.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
